content: **this bag is created upside down by making the straps first folding and creating the bag portion next and then seaming up the bottom to finish you can adapt the strap length easily by just adding or subtracting an equal amount of stitches from the strap portions the fresh mesh stitch design creates a mesh effect without the giant gaping holes ** check out regina p designs website to find out more get sneak peeks free patterns & sales https //www reginapdesigns com/ if you have any questions about this pattern or any of the other patterns from regina p designs or want to show off your finished projects with our patterns please join our facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/869715883461437/ ***materials *** premier rodeo yarn approx 370 yds total h 5mm hook scissors needle ***abbreviations us terms *** skip = skip sts = stitches st = stitch sl= slip_stitch chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet decrease = decrease copyright 2024 regina p designs all rights reserved all content copyright and other rights reserved by regina p designs no content may be duplicated without express written consent by purchasing/downloading/using any regina p designs patterns you agree to the terms of use -all regina p designs patterns are for personal use only -it is prohibited to reproduce copy publish in any form including video or distribute this pattern its parts or photos in any way or form including translations into foreign languages -you are free to do as you wish with the finished products made from these patterns with the agreement that regina p designs will be credited for the pattern itself return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final if you have a problem with working out parts of a pattern please contact the designer for help
